verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4550>journeys<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3318>came<s%> out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> under the <S%H3027>leadership<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>recorded<s%> their <S%H4161>starting<s%> <S%H4161>places<s%> according to their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> by the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> according to their <S%H4161>starting<s%> <S%H4161>places.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%> on the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>started<s%> out <S%H7311>boldly<s%> <S%H3027><s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%>

while the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H6912>burying<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their first-born <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> among them. The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had also <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on their <S%H430>gods.<s%>
Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H864>Etham,<s%> and <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to Pi-hahiroth, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5921>faces<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Baal-zephon; and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4024>Migdol.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6367>Hahiroth,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H1870>journey<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H864>Etham,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H4785>Marah.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H4785>Marah,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H362>Elim;<s%> and in <S%H362>Elim<s%> there were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H9407>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H8558>trees;<s%> and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H362>Elim,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H9358>Sin.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H9358>Sin,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H1850>Dophkah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H1850>Dophkah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H442>Alush.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H442>Alush,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H7508>Rephidim;<s%> now it was <S%H8033>there<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7508>Rephidim,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Kibroth-hattaavah.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from Kibroth-hattaavah, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H2698>Hazeroth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H7575>Rithmah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7575>Rithmah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Rimmon-perez.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from Rimmon-perez, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H3841>Libnah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H7446>Rissah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7446>Rissah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H6954>Kehelathah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6954>Kehelathah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8234>Shepher.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8234>Shepher,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H2732>Haradah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2732>Haradah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H4722>Makheloth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H4722>Makheloth,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H8480>Tahath.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H8480>Tahath,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H8646>Terah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H8646>Terah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H4989>Mithkah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H4989>Mithkah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H2832>Hashmonah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2832>Hashmonah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H4149>Moseroth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H4149>Moseroth,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Bene-jaakan.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from Bene-jaakan, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Hor-haggidgad.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from Hor-haggidgad, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H3193>Jotbathah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H3193>Jotbathah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H5684>Abronah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H5684>Abronah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Ezion-geber.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from Ezion-geber, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> that is, <S%H6946>Kadesh.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> at the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom.<s%>

Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> at the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H3318>come<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> [day] in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> twenty-three <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4194>died<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor.<s%>

Now the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5045>Negev<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H935>coming<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Then they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H6758>Zalmonah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6758>Zalmonah,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H6325>Punon.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6325>Punon,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H88>Oboth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Iye-abarim, at the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H5864>Iyim,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Dibon-gad.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from Dibon-gad, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Almon-diblathaim.
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from Almon-diblathaim, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> [opposite] <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
And they <S%H2583>camped<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> from Beth-jeshimoth as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Abel-shittim in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> [opposite] <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> you <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>

then you shall <S%H3423>drive<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and destroy <S%H6>all<s%> their <S%H3605>figured<s%> <S%H4906>stones,<s%> and destroy <S%H4906>all<s%> their <S%H6>molten<s%> <S%H3605>images<s%> and <S%H4541>demolish<s%> <S%H4541>all<s%> their <S%H8045>high<s%> <S%H3605>places;<s%>
and you shall <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> in it, for I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

'And you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> according to your <S%H4940>families;<s%> to the <S%H7227>larger<s%> you shall <S%H7235>give<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and to the <S%H4592>smaller<s%> you shall <S%H4591>give<s%> <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> <S%H413>Wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>falls<s%> to anyone, that shall be his. You shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> according to the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of your fathers.

'But <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that those <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H3498>let<s%> <S%H3498>remain<s%> of them [will become] as <S%H7899>pricks<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and as <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and they shall <S%H6887>trouble<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3427>live.<s%>
'And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that as I <S%H1819>plan<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to them, so I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to you.' "
